long_description: Longer days, warming temperatures and the women's REI Fleet tights on your favorite trail. Need we say more?. Fabric wicks moisture to keep you comfortable, and 4-way stretch lets you move freely. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Zippered rear security pocket holds a small media player, debit card or key. Ergonomic seams reduce chafing and enhance mobility, and gusseted crotch supports a full range of movement. Breathable waistband features a drawcord waist to secure the fit. REI Fleet tights offer an active fit that moves with you during motion.
short_description: Longer days, warming temperatures and the women's REI Fleet tights on your favorite trail. Need we say more?.
